languages.text: "Тем самым предупредив и противника. Какой смысл?"

traits.locale_text: "Тем самым предупредив и противника. Какой смысл?"

languages.text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"
languages.original_text: "Тем самым предупредив и противника. Какой смысл?"

traits.locale_text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What is the point?"
"Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What is the point?"
"Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"
"Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"
"Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"
"Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"

languages.text: "Womit auch der Feind vorgewarnt wird. Was sollte das bringen?"
languages.original_text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"

traits.locale_text: "Womit auch der Feind vorgewarnt wird. Was sollte das bringen?"

languages.text: « Vous avertiriez l'ennemi par la même occasion. Notre plan perdrait alors tout son intérêt. »
languages.original_text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avertiriez l'ennemi par la même occasion. Notre plan perdrait alors tout son intérêt. »

languages.text: 「それでは事前に敵にも警告を与えることになります。そんなことに何の意味があるんですか？」
languages.original_text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"

traits.locale_text: 「それでは事前に敵にも警告を与えることになります。そんなことに何の意味があるんですか？」

languages.text: «Eso alertaría también al enemigo. ¿De qué serviría?».
languages.original_text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"

traits.locale_text: «Eso alertaría también al enemigo. ¿De qué serviría?».

languages.text: “这样敌人也会警觉过来，这么做有什么意义呢？”
languages.original_text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"

traits.locale_text: “这样敌人也会警觉过来，这么做有什么意义呢？”

languages.text: "O zaman düşmanın eline koz vermiş oluruz. Ne gerek var?"
languages.original_text: "Thus forewarning the enemy as well. What would be the point?"

traits.locale_text: "O zaman düşmanın eline koz vermiş oluruz. Ne gerek var?"
